ygData.subject: RE: Sorri
ygData.msgSnippet: yes spec not just max 35, they r higher that. even at 49, 1/3 of them is con blue. ... Those ... times ... NOT a ... repair ... Lim Choong Ee Assistant
ygData.messageBody:
yes spec not just max 35, they r higher that.
even at 49, 1/3 of them is con blue.


At 09:38 AM 9/29/99 +0800, you wrote:
>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Wuming (aka Nodare) said spec range from 33-38 leh.
>
>On Tuesday, 28 September, 1999 3:44 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
>wrote:
>> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>>
>> You think 35 is pain, 40 is worse...... 45 LAGI worse....... Anyway, specs
>are
>> max 35 I think, where got red?
>>
>> Fesse Estasis, sewing away in East Karanas and ignoring ever leveling for
>now.
>>
>> LKW wrote:
>>
>> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> >
>> > KILL GARREN!!! RIP HIM OFF!!! ASK HIM PAY YOU 1,000PP AS COMPENSATION,
>> > AND PAY ALL IN MAILING LIST 10,000PP EACH ;P
>> >
>> > Anyway all caster kakis who hit lvl 35 hell lvl better camp for jboot now.
>> > It seem like only those higher than lvl 35 will get the quest note.
Those
>> > at 35 (myself) will still get the boot. Start camping around 6-7pm is a
>> > good time, and give yaself up to next day noon.
>> >
>> > The reason we MUST get jboot is to lvl beyond hell lvl. FYI I died 3
times
>> > in a row with half bubb xp and still didnt drop lvl, as compared to drop
>> > more than half bubb at lvl 34. From this we can see that hell lvl is
NOT a
>> > rumor. Gaining xp at hell lvl is really a pain in the ass, REAL pain!
>> > Solo kiting will become our best choice, which required u to have jboot.
>> >
>> > Wiz w/o jboot can also kite using bond of force (I did it once last night,
>> > forget to turn on my turbo speed, hehe), but if mob resist ya bond spell,
>> > you can be 95% dead meat, unless u can zone out safely.
>> >
>> > Actually we can go for red mob (eg spectre) as a 2-3 men grp, but it still
>> > required all to have jboots. I know it's boring but trust me, it really
>> > worth it. Solo kiting a mob 3-4 lvl below u is MUCH safer and better xp
>> > than hunting a white/black mob with a team of 2-3. Grp kiting a red mob
>> > will take some time to get hold of the coordination, but
>> > I believe it pays.
>> >
>> > No pain no gain, no gain no glory.
>> > Ziltus.
>> >
>> > p/s: I'm forever banished from Qeynos region liao. Now kill treants or
>> > qeynos npc also no faction msg. My faction already hit the 'beyond
repair"
>> > stage, hehe. Welcome to hell man!
>> >
>> > On Tuesday, 28 September, 1999 9:04 AM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
>> > [SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
>> > > From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>> > >
>> > > FF,
>> > > Sorri about last nite at Lower Guk. It wasn't ur fault. It my

>> > should
>> > > have get the group to clear it instead of blaming you. Please accept my
>> > > apologies.
